1.0.name: wordpress/addthis-trending-content
1.0.description:
Automatically list newest top social content from your blog or website in the widget and understand how trending content is increasing your traffic. The content to be displayed is configurable with options like Trending, Top Shared or Top Clicked and with time period.

For detailed instructions on how to get your Profile ID and enable Content Feeds refer AddThis Support.
